translations: v．虐待，折磨：对人或动物进行不公正或残忍的对待。

sentences.sentence: Article 448 Any serviceman who maltreats prisoners of war shall, if the circumstances are flagrant, be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years.
sentences.translation: 第四百四十八条虐待俘虏，情节恶劣的，处三年以下有期徒刑。

sentences.sentence: Whoever maltreats disabled persons shall be punished in accordance with the provisions of Article 22 of the Regulations on Administrative Penalties for Public Security;
sentences.translation: 虐待残疾人的，依照治安管理处罚条例第二十二条的规定处罚；

sentences.sentence: Whoever maltreats a minor family member in a vicious manner shall be investigated for criminal responsibility in accordance with the provisions in Article 182 of the Criminal Law.
sentences.translation: 虐待未成年的家庭成员，情节恶劣的，依照刑法第一百八十二条的规定追分刑事责任。、。
